name: Music Player
description:
Join our discord server here: https://discord.hycrafthd.net

Play every youtube video, livestream and more with this player! We use lava player to ensure this diversity.

Learn more about lavaplayer here: https://github.com/sedmelluq/lavaplayer

Sources:
  - YouTube
  - SoundCloud
  - Bandcamp
  - Vimeo
  - Twitch streams
  - Local files
  - HTTP URLs

File formats:
  - MP3
  - FLAC
  - WAV
  - Matroska/WebM (AAC, Opus or Vorbis codecs)
  - MP4/M4A (AAC codec)
  - OGG streams (Opus, Vorbis and FLAC codecs)
  - AAC streams
  - Stream playlists (M3U and PLS)
